info.title: axle optimizer
info.description:
Module for optimization of assets, households, and pools across markets.

Authentication

Authentication is via Oauth2, please contact [support@axle.energy](mailto:support@axle.energy) for credentials. credentials.

Core concepts

  • The core unit of functionality is a **Pool** to be be optimized.
  • Each Pool is associated with a single **PriceZone**, and can be optimized as a block.
  • Each pool contains a number of **assets**, associated with a set of **households**. Each **household** is associated with a specific **GridConnection**.

Typical usage

  • Register a new pool and associated households and assets via the *entities* endpoints
  • Retrieve optimized profiles for the pool and associated assets via the *optimize* endpoints
  • New requests to the *optimize* endpoints prompt a re-optimization, allowing plans to be refreshedon multiple timescales and participation in baseload, day ahead, and intraday markets
  • Accept/reject a plan for a Pool to trigger physical execution of the plan and update operational schedulesfor the Assets in that Pool

Markets

The optimizer is integrated with a wide range of markets across Europe. See the **MarketTypes** schema for more details. We cover:

  • Wholesale markets (e.g. day ahead, intraday)
  • Transmission and Distribution markets (e.g. TNUOS, DUOS)
  • Balancing Services (e.g. FCR-D, aFRR)
  • Demand Response schemes (e.g. DFS, NEBEF)
  • Local network flexibility (e.g. Pilot, Scale)

Webhooks

We can configure webhooks which we call when a new Plan becomes available for a Pool. Please get in touch at [support@axle.energy](mailto:support@axle.energy) to configure your webhooks.

Combines a set of execution instructions for assets,
a set of bid/offers in relevant markets, and a load profile
for the wholesale markets
